data.name: Company Profile
data.content:
About Finecables

Finecables Enterprise Co., Limited, established in 2003, is committed to being the world's leading manufacturer in connectivity industry. At Finecables, with a customer focus and a wealth of practical industry experience, we strive to provide customers in the world with reliable and innovative connectivity products and excellent services as well. Meanwhile, we continue to extend our portfolio by developing customized products for various applications, which cover not only industrial connectors, but also electronic interconnection and data networking. To be your one-stop OEM/ODM sourcing for all custom-designed solutions is our goal. Moreover, "respect and compliance with covenants and no excuse", "rapid action and respond", "practical deep and effect orientation", and "pursuit of being excellent" comprise Finecables' service spirit.

Products



As a professional wire harness and industrial connector manufacturer, through continuously innovative strength and highly in-depth development and manufacturing, Finecables has expanded a large variety of product portfolio:

  • Circular Connectors for industrial applications: (M5/M8/M10/M12/M16/M20/ 7/8"/M23/RD24)
  • Solenoid Valve Connectors for Pneumatic, hydraulic and electro-magnetic applications (Size A/B/C)
  • Industrial I/O Connectors for data transmission network (USB/RJ45/Mini-Din/ D-SUB/UHF/HDMI)
  • ISO-BUS Connectors and Junction Boxes for field-BUS network control (4/6/8-port M8/M12 connectors with 7/8"/M23 connectors)
  • Temperature Sensors and Wire/Cable Harness
  • Customized Solutions

R&D

Based on our years of experience and technology accumulation in connectivity industry, supported by our powerful productivity and tooling ability, Finecables' R&D team, make full use of our competitive advantages, to research and develop innovative total solutions, seamlessly meeting customer-specified requirements.



Finecables fulfills its core value of Rapidity, Excellence, Crisis Awareness, and Gratitude, by insisting our long-term partnership and win-win cooperation with both customers and suppliers, to follow our business philosophy-- "Passion for Connection!"

data.name: Corporate Culture
data.content:
"Passion for Connection!" It outlines Finecables' corporate culture. With great enthusiasm, Finecables is committed to connectivity industry and makes efforts to build long-term partnership and win-win cooperation with both customers and suppliers. In a word, we are your right business partner!



Our Philosophy

  • Our Vision: To be the world's leading manufacturer in connectivity industry.
  • Our Mission: Focus-on the customers,to be committed to provide them with reliable and innovative connectivity products and excellent service as well.
  • Our Business Policy: Initiative and Self-improvement,Innovation and Development, Partnership and Cooperation.
  • Our Core Value: Rapidity, Excellence, Crisis awareness, Gratitude.
  • Finecables Spirit: Respect and compliance with covenants, No excuse; Rapid action and respond; Practical deed and effect Orientation; Pursuit of being excellent.

Customer Focus Strategy

Serving our customers is the only reason Finecables exists; Customer demand is the fundamental driving force of our development.

  • High quality, excellent service, low operating costs, and giving top priority to meeting customer requirements to enhance their competitiveness and profitability.
  • Continuously improve our management level to realize efficient process-based organization operation for ensuring high quality.
  • Developing with our peers in the industry as both competitors and partners to jointly create a favorable environment and share the benefits of the value chain.

Cost Efficiency & Rapid Response

Cost turns out to be one of the important factors to drive outsourcing globally. Finecables implements strictly 7S management system and continuous manufacturing process improvement, while the cost in China is much below that of other American and European countries. Beside cost and expertise, the turnaround time to accomplish a project is also crucial in business as the market is struggling and volatile. We understand some of our clients have strict time requirement for their business needs. Finecables has achieved quick turnaround by strict management and effective communication way.

data.name: History
data.content:
Taking time as X-axis and technology innovation as Y-axis, Finecables makes every progress to present its young but passionate history.


Finecables Milestones

2014
Nov.---Finecables Inc. branch established in Seattle, WA. USA
Oct.---Being American NMEA member
Sep.---North China sales office established in Hebei Province
Jun.---Japan sales office established in Tokyo, Japan
2013
Oct.---ISO 14001:2004 EMS certified by TÜV SÜD
Aug.---“Thanksgiving for You” FC 10th Anniversary Celebration
2012
Feb. Factory: CSA Certified
Mar.---UL Certificates for 50+ items of M12 Sensor Connectors
Feb.---CE certificates for M23 Series Products
2011
Oct.---East China Office established in Suzhou Industrial Park
2009
Jul.---European Customer Service Center established in East Sussex, UK
2008
Jun.---UL certificates for M12 Sensor Connectors:
2007
Jun.---CE certificates for M12/M8 Sensor Connector Series
Mar.---UL certificates for Wire/Cable Harness
2005
May---Factory site moved to Humen Town, Dongguan City.
Apr.---ISO 9001:2000 QMS certified by TÜV SÜD
2003
Aug.---Established in Nanshan District, Shenzhen
